sentences.en: Affordable digital camcorder with 3.0 mega pixel CMOS sensor, which enhances high - quality image capturing.
sentences.cn: 得起数码摄像机3.0万像素cmos传感器, 提高了高质量的图像捕捉.

sentences.en: Affordable digital camcorder with 5.0 mega pixel CMOS sensor, which enhances high - quality image capturing.
sentences.cn: 得起数码摄像机具有5.0万像素cmos传感器, 提高了高质量的图像捕捉.
摄像机电池, 便宜的数码相机.

sentences.en: Don't take any camera or camcorder inside.
sentences.cn: 不要把照相机或摄像机带进去.

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: Home movies can be made a camcorder system, a VCR connected a simple video camera.
sentences.cn: 利用摄录像系统即可制作家庭电影,这系统由一台卡式录像机连接一台简单的摄影机组成.

sentences.en: However, in this way, the camcorder included image signals can only be partial, and is intermittent.
sentences.cn: 但是在这栽办法洋, 摄像机所摄不入的图像暗记只能是部分的, 而且是继续式的.

sentences.en: Lemelson holds patents on machine-vision systems, an industrial robot, a fax machine, a copy machine, a tape-recorder drive, and a camcorder.
sentences.cn: 他发明过机器视觉系统、工业机器人、传真机、复印机、磁带记录器驱动器以及便携式摄像机。

sentences.en: Michael: I am gonna buy a new DV camcorder, any suggestions?
sentences.cn: 迈克尔: 我打算新买一台数码摄像机.你有好的建议 吗 ?

sentences.en: One of his friends will also bring a camcorder for the party.
sentences.cn: (他的一位朋友也要为宴会带个录像机. )

sentences.en: The camcorder winds the tape back or forward at high speed.
sentences.cn: 这款便携式摄像机可以使录像带快速倒回或前进。

sentences.en: This camcorder came out to be about $ 190 - 195 for me after tax.
sentences.cn: 这台摄象机问世时是大约$190-195(税后).

sentences.en: This ultra compact camcorder uses drive technology to record video.
sentences.cn: 这种超小型摄像机采用硬盘技术的视频记录.

sentences.en: Upload videos from your web camera or camcorder.
sentences.cn: 从你的网照相机或摄象机上载录像.

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic functions: auto focus, playback facility and zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的摄像机应该具备以下基本功能: 自动聚焦 、 回放和变焦.

trans.tran_en: a type of camera that records pictures and sound on  videotape
